body_html:
Here is a ubuntu 18.10 build (kernal 4.18), tensorflow r1.12 branch, python 3.6, CUDA 10.0, cuDNN 7.4.1.5, NCCL 2.3.7, tensorRT 5.0, compute capability 7.5, 6.1, for my RTX 2080 TI.
tensorflow-1.12.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl

It took me around 2 full day to get it built, so many issue among bazel version (I used 0.18.1 it works), python (3.6.7), gcc g++(I used 7.3), etc too many

Here is a ubuntu 18.10 build (kernal 4.18), tensorflow r1.12 branch, python 3.6, CUDA 10.0, cuDNN 7.4.1.5, NCCL 2.3.7, tensorRT 5.0, compute capability 7.5, 6.1, for my RTX 2080 TI.
tensorflow-1.12.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
It took me around 2 full day to get it built, so many issue among bazel version (I used 0.18.1 it works), python (3.6.7), gcc g++(I used 7.3), etc too many
body:
Here is a ubuntu 18.10 build (kernal 4.18), tensorflow r1.12 branch, python 3.6, CUDA 10.0, cuDNN 7.4.1.5, NCCL 2.3.7, tensorRT 5.0, compute capability 7.5, 6.1, for my RTX 2080 TI.
[tensorflow-1.12.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl](https://app.box.com/s/jcw8uq6jannpg4myzighl166bq1zg07e)

It took me around 2 full day to get it built, so many issue among bazel version (I used 0.18.1 it works), python (3.6.7), gcc g++(I used 7.3), etc too many
